blogs.title: Welcome to my New Blog
blogs.body: This blog is going to be a place where Shmoe and I share out thoughts. As you will see, Shmoe and I rarely see eye to eye
blogs.author: phil

blogs.title: Hello, my name is Shmoe
blogs.body: I'm looking forward to blogging here with Phil, But right off the bat I'm going tp have to disagree with him. We often see eye to eye
blogs.author: shmoe

blogs.title: My Response to Shmoe
blogs.body: Dear friend. I think you've proven my point, if only in a quasi-paradoxical way. But let's not dwell on our disagreements. I think we both have much to say that has little to do with our opinions of each other's opinions
blogs.author: phil
